追求, 恳请, 源自拉丁语invitare=to invite

bilingual.source: Who did David invite to the party?
bilingual.target: 大卫邀请了谁参加聚会？

bilingual.source: Then I will invite you to come with me.
bilingual.target: 然后我会邀请你和我一起去。

bilingual.source: Some locals invite you to their home for dinner.
bilingual.target: 一些当地人邀请你去他们家吃晚饭。

bilingual.source: Display the albums and invite your parents to see them.
bilingual.target: 展示相册并邀请你的父母来看。

bilingual.source: You should invite your new English-speaking friends to your club!
bilingual.target: 你应该邀请你新的说英语的朋友加入你的俱乐部！

bilingual.source: Could I invite my friends to a party on Saturday, Mom?
bilingual.target: 妈妈，我可以邀请朋友周六来参加聚会吗？

bilingual.source: Guess what! Mum says I can invite some friends to my house.
bilingual.target: 猜猜看！妈妈说我可以邀请一些朋友来我家。

list.abstract: invite，英 [ɪnˈvaɪt , ˈɪnvaɪt]，美 [ɪnˈvaɪt , ˈɪnvaɪt]，英语单词。作动词为邀请；征求；引起等。作名词为邀请；请帖；邀请书等。例句：They invite performers to taste homemade food.（他们邀请表演者品尝自制食物。） invite的近义词有serve，attend，court等。
Invite是一个基于城市精选生活方式场景邀约的品质社交平台。通过将生活方式场景与追求高品质生活和拥有相似兴趣爱好的人相匹配，从而创造一种优质乐活的社交网络，营造一种真诚有趣的社交氛围，开启一种全新的社交模式。Invite鼓励用户发起和参与生活方式场景邀约，将虚拟世界的聊天交友转化为线下社交及约会的直面体验。

yingyinNormal.en: So why didn't you invite Conway? Brockhart was invited instead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么不邀请康威？被邀请的是布洛哈特。

yingyinNormal.en: Your invite has been sent to entire galaxy!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的邀请函已经发送个全星系了！

yingyinNormal.en: Why did you invite him? I can't stand that guy!
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么你要邀请他？我无法忍受那个男的！

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on. You're getting married and you didn't invite me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，你们结婚居然没邀请我？

yingyinNormal.en: If you're such good friends, how come he didn't invite you? He's your great-great-grandpa. How come he didn't invite you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你真的是他的朋友，他为什么不邀请你。他是你的曾曾祖父，那他怎么不邀请你呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, Joey's having a party, and he wasn't gonna invite us?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，乔伊要开派对，但不邀请我们？

yingyinNormal.en: How come you never invite Sheldon and me on a double date?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么从来不邀请谢尔顿和我参加四人约会呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Just because your name's on the invite doesn't make you a hostess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要因为你在邀请之列就把自己当女主人。

yingyinNormal.en: It would be an excellent way to meet new friends. You could invite the militia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那将是认识新朋友最好的方式，你可以邀请民兵们。

yingyinNormal.en: We're gonna invite all the top buyers, which is why we have to go balls to the wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要邀请所有的高端买家，所以我们得竭尽全力。

yingyinNormal.en: Turns out Sheldon didn't invite his brother. Now it's starting to sound like a wedding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我才发现谢尔顿没有邀请他哥哥。现在开始有婚礼的感觉了。

yingyinNormal.en: I think it's a great idea. Yeah, we could have a dinner party and just invite her close friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得这主意不错，我们办个晚餐派对，邀请好朋友过来。

yingyinNormal.en: One thing, her ladyship has been kind enough to invite the servants to hear Dame Nellie tomorrow evening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对了， 夫人好心邀请仆人们明晚一起听内莉夫人演唱。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, then, so just invite me. Please, I was trying to be nice. You're the worst one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，就只邀请我就好了啊/拜托，我只是在说好听的话，你是最糟糕的。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, fine. Hey, can you think of a reason I shouldn't invite Amy to come with me? Nope.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，行，你能想到我不应该邀请艾米跟我一起来的理由吗？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, you tried. What more could you have done? Hey, why didn't you invite him in the first place?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你尝试过了。你也没有其他办法了？你为什么一开始不邀请他呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. There they are. You know, we have a couple of mixed families in the neighborhood, so I thought I'd invite them over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们到了，你知道，我们的邻居有几对混杂的家庭，所以我就邀请他们过来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God Phoebe, this is impossible. We can't do this by Friday. We have to find a place. We have to invite people. We have to get food.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不可能，我们不可能在星期五办，要找到一个地点，邀请客人，买好食物。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, his name is Alec. But the C Got smudged. Yeah, well, why don't you just text him and then invite him back for dinner?
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲，他叫艾丽克，但那个"C"被抹花了。对了，你怎么不给他发个短信邀请他来吃晚饭。

yingyinNormal.en: And for those of you who are just beginning that journey to the West and East, I want to invite you today on this amazing journey with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你刚刚开始这种旅程，去西方或者去东方，那我今天就要邀请你和我一起走。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Remind the person that this is your point of view, and then <highlight>invite</highlight> critique.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提醒对方这是你的观点，然后邀请对方评论。

examination_example.sentence: Each subject was then <highlight>invited</highlight> to look inside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后邀请每个受试者往里面看。

examination_example.sentence: Reding <highlight>invited</highlight> corporations to sign up for gender balance goals of 40 per cent female board membership.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Reding邀请公司签署了女性董事会成员占40%的性别平衡目标。

sense_info_list.en: (of an action or situation) tend to elicit a particular reaction or response or to tempt someone to do something

追求, 恳请, 源自拉丁语invitare=to invite

word_usage.usage: invite作及物动词，其后可直接接名词或代词，如：invite all our relatives 邀请我们所有的亲戚。
invite的常见搭配为invite sb. to sth.; invite sb. to do sth.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 引人注目的；吸引人的；美好的；令人向往的
n. 口头邀请；请帖；请柬；邀请；要求；吸引；号召；引诱；招致；挑逗

word_family.mean: v. 邀请；征求；征聘；招致；引起；吸引；诱使；怂恿

sense_info_list.en: make a polite, formal, or friendly request to someone to go somewhere or to do something

examination_example.sentence: A weather expert <highlight>invited</highlight> him to go there for his mission.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位气象专家邀请他去那里执行任务。

examination_example.sentence: Thank you for <highlight>inviting</highlight> me to join you on the show, Henry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亨利，谢谢你邀请我参加你的节目。

sense_info_list.en: (of an action or situation) tend to elicit a particular reaction or response or to tempt someone to do something
make a formal or polite request for something, especially an application for a job or opinions on a particular topic from someone

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 口头邀请；请帖；请柬；邀请；要求；吸引；号召；引诱；招致；挑逗

word_family.mean: v. 邀请；征求；征聘；招致；引起；吸引；诱使；怂恿

sense_info_list.en: make a polite; formal; or friendly request to someone to go somewhere or to do something

examination_example.sentence: He wanted to <highlight>invite</highlight> her to join in a study project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他想邀请她参加一个研究项目。

examination_example.sentence: After a few months of being quite down and unhappy, she was <highlight>invited</highlight> to join a local bike club.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在非常沮丧和不开心的几个月后，她被邀请加入当地的自行车俱乐部。

examination_example.sentence: Never afraid to talk up his own accomplishments, a boastful Creme made a fortune as wealthy families with social ambitions <highlight>invited</highlight> him to their kitchens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从来不怕谈论自己的成就，当一个有社交野心的富裕家庭邀请他去厨房时，自夸的 Creme 发了大财。

sense_info_list.en: (of an action or situation) tend to elicit a particular reaction or response or to tempt someone to do something
make a formal or polite request for something; especially an application for a job or opinions on a particular topic from someone

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 引人注目的；吸引人的；美好的；令人向往的
n. 口头邀请；请帖；请柬；邀请；要求；吸引；号召；引诱；招致；挑逗

word_family.mean: v. 邀请；征求；征聘；招致；引起；吸引；诱使；怂恿

sense_info_list.en: make a polite, formal, or friendly request to someone to go somewhere or to do something

examination_example.sentence: Why don't you <highlight>invite</highlight> (邀请) Jerry to play sports in the playground tomorrow morning?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你为什么不邀请杰瑞明天早上去操场运动呢？

examination_example.sentence: That was why he was <highlight>invited</highlight> by the film director.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是他被电影导演邀请的原因。

examination_example.sentence: The scientists <highlight>invited</highlight> 42 university students to take part in a test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家邀请了42名大学生参加测试。
